name: .APA File Extension
summary: Learn about .APA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive of a software development project created with RSView Studio or RSView ME (Machine Edition); used for creating HMI (Human Machine Interface) applications.

content: APA files may be generated using RSView Studio's Application Manager. They are saved in an archive format than can be transferred between multiple computer systems.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
